impact-statement: A cross-linking screen finds proteins that interact with TANGO1 to export Procollagen VII, and suggests a new model for the secretion of these bulky cargoes that are involved in skin and bone formation.

competing-interest.conf2: The other authors declare that no competing interests exist.
